newInput

public void newInput(java.util.LinkedList<InputTuple> input)
New input data has arrived, that means some events can be triggered, such as jumps, jetpack activation etc. These should only be triggered in control updates, so we just store inputs here, for further processing, when update is triggered.

Parameters:
input - A queue of actions gathered in the last time frame.
